text: qayaamath ka ilm Allah hee ki taraf lautaaya jaata hai aur jo jo phal apne shagufo mein se nikalte hai aur jo maada hamal se hoti hai aur jo bacche wo janthi hai, sab ka ilm ose hai aur jis din Allah taâ€™ala un (mushriko) ko bula kar daryaaft farmayega mere shareek kahaa hai, wo jawaab denge ke hum ne to tujhe keh sunaaya ke hum mein se to koyi is ka gawaah nahi
